text: Hi, i have left a review for a HubSpot Agency in the  Agency Directory.  I connected via Linkedin. Now i made a small mistake which i would like to edit but i can´t seem to find a edit function. Does anyone know if it´s possible to edit it?
Hi <@UBT0AHWLD> nice to meet you :wave:. I work here at HubSpot. If you direct message me with the details you would like changed I can see if I can get those changed on the backend for you?
I have changed the lead status of my internal team but I am still receiving email notifications of them being leads. How can I remove them from this status and notifications?
Anyone having trouble seeing any embedded forms?
I’m not having any issues, any link you can share?  I know ad blockers on occasion will catch forms so it may be worth checking in an incognito window to see if that’s the issue too
Ah they are just back up now. Maybe you were right. Thanks
Let me know if you see this again and I can look into it
